recipesJson.name: Juice Fairy Yummy Cannoli
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: I decided to use the FA Cannoli one shot because that is a very good Cannoli but it needs a little bit of buttery goodness so I enhanced it with some WF Cannoli shell and then added some extra creamy sweet goodness by using a touch of LA cream cheese icing. I used FA King for my fruit and and boosted the berry note with a touch of FA boysenberry. Enjoy itâ€™s easy and delicious ðŸ˜‹
